location.address: Jl. Raflesia No 80 Ciputat, South Tangerang

highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee official college newspaper website
Drive, design and build layout landing page for site
Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk
Installing, configuring and supporting network equipment including routers, proxy servers, switches, WAN accelerators, DNS and DHCP
Monitoring computer systems to improve network performance for all systems
Updating network equipment to the latest firmware releases
